channel.title: I need help with my zammy godswords spec [advanced coders needed]
channel.description:
Everything is perfect up to the point where I want it to entangle them when I use the special
I've already made it so it ice barrages and I've tried castOnPlayer.uberentangle; but it didn't compile properly..
Any advanced coders please help :) :) :) :)

item.title: I need help with my zammy godswords spec [advanced coders needed]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

[quote=“Runer King, post:10, topic:170659”] if you = can’t code;
sendMessage(“GTFO of mopar!”);
}else{
sendMessage(“You’re ok, you can stay in mopar”);[/quote]

Thanks for the spam douchebag
and yes I can code.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with my zammy godswords spec [advanced coders needed]
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
item.description:
@iceman327 wrote:

Okay so I have these:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 50) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 50) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount <= 49) {//zamgodsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 50) {//zamgodsword startAnimation(2066); specialDamage = 40 + misc.random(5); specialAmount -= 50; }

Where Do I add the AttackingOn stuff

Read full topic
